entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Temperature: -35.2°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
